1.text: And after the sabbaths, in the shining forth to one of the sabbaths, came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to behold the tomb.

2.text: And, behold, there was a great shaking; for a messenger of the Lord, having come down out of heaven, having come near, rolled away the stone from the door, and sat above it.

3.text: And his aspect was as lightning, and his garment white as snow.

4.text: And from fear of him the keepers were shaken, and were as dead.

5.text: And the messenger, having answered, said to the women, Be ye not afraid; for I know that ye seek Jesus, having been crucified.

6.text: He is not here: for he was raised, as he said. Come, see the place where the Lord lay.

7.text: And having gone quickly, say ye to his disciples, that he was raised from the dead; and, behold, he leads before you into Galilee: there shall ye see him: behold I have said to you.

8.text: And they having come quickly from the tomb, with fear and great joy, ran to announce to his disciples.

9.text: And as they were going to announce to his disciples, behold, Jesus met them, saying, Rejoice ye. And they having come, held his feet firmly, and worshipped him.

10.text: Then says Jesus to them, Be ye not afraid: retire, and announce to my brethren that they should go away into Galilee, and there shall they see me.

11.text: And they going, behold certain of the watch having come to the city, announced to the chief priests all having been done.

12.text: And having been gathered together with the elders, and having taken counsel, they gave sufficient silver coins to the soldiers,

13.text: Saying, Say ye, That his disciples having come by night, stole him, we being asleep.

14.text: And if this should be beard by the leader, we will persuade him, and we will make you undisturbed.

15.text: And they having received the silver coins, did as they were taught; and this word was spread a report by the Jews till this day.

16.text: And the eleven disciples went into Galilee, into a mountain, where Jesus commanded them:

17.text: And having seen him, they worshipped him; and some doubted.

18.text: And Jesus, having come near, spake to them, saying, All power has been given me in heaven and upon earth:

19.text: Therefore, having gone, disciple all nations; immersing them into the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit:

20.text: Teaching them to keep all things whatever I have commanded you; and behold, I am with you all the days, even to the end of time. Amen.
